required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study Investigating the Comparability of Somatrogon in Two Different Drug Product Presentations
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Single-Center, Randomized, Cross-Over, Clinical Study Investigating the Comparability of Somatrogon in Two Different Drug Product Presentations

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1, single-center, open-label randomized, 2×2 crossover (Ref Test | Test Ref) study with a washout of two weeks to establish bioequivalence between single dose of somatrogon in a PEN to somatrogon in VIAL administered sc in healthy male volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: The subjects will undergo a screening period (Day -28 to -1), and when eligible for study participation will be randomized to receive one sc injection of one of two somatrogon drug product presentations on Day 0, either the PEN or VIAL presentation. A series of blood draws and study procedures will be carried out over the course of the next 10 days to evaluate the subjects. Following a two week washout period, the subjects will be brought back to the clinic to receive the other somatrogon drug product presentation, and once again followed for the next 14 days to study completion.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This is a Phase 1, single-center, open-label randomized, 2×2 crossover (Ref Test | Test Ref) study with a washout of two weeks to establish bioequivalence between single dose of somatrogon in a PEN to somatrogon in VIAL administered sc in healthy male volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve (AUC) of the serum concentration-time from time 0 to a specific time (AUCt)
Area under the curve (AUC) of the serum concentration-time from time 0 to infinity (AUC∞)
Serum concentration from of maximum concentration (Cmax) of somatrogon levels in serum

secondary_outcome.measure: AUCt of IGF-1 and IGFBP-3 levels
AUC∞ of IGF-1 and IGFBP-3 levels
Cmax of IGF-1 and IGFBP-3 levels
Apparent Terminal Rate Constant (λz) and t½

intervention.description: A single dose of 12 mg of somatrogon will be injected as one sc injection to the arm on each dosing day (Day 0 and Day 14).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male volunteers aged 18-55 (inclusive) years
- Body Mass Index (BMI) 19 to 32 kg/m2 (inclusive) and weighing at least 55 kg
- Non-smoking (by declaration) for a period of at least six months prior to screening visit
Exclusion Criteria:
-
